title: Avallacchhh
author: Avallacchhh
created_time: July 12, 2023, 01:28:53 PMLast edit: July 13, 2023, 09:02:17 AM by Avallacchhh
content: Hi, i registered on rollbit about 3 weeks ago and do mainly betting. I had no problems, i deposited funds and withdraw funds, but now it says i cant withdraw anymore. I asked the support, but they said they need to wait for a colleague. Thats about 7 hours ago and they wont answer anymore if i ask about an update. I dont know what to do anymore. Someone know what to do?

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: Sorry to hear about your problem with Rollbit.com. I know they are a reputable company. Maybe you need to wait a little longer to hear back from them. It's only been 7 hours.Here's the information on how to format your scam accusation.Code:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]Copy and paste it in new thread then fill all data.Scam report example:What happened::  I saw escrow.ms's lolipop thread 4 days ago and placed a order for 1000 lolipops. After I sent him payment, he just went offline and never came back. I think he's a big liar and a scam artist. Stay away from him.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=76380Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260070.0Amount Scammed:  2 BTC/$176.40Payment Method: BitcoinsProof of Payment: http://blockchain.info/tx/b80f35cebae98fcbd8eb0e2eaea6def41f90ad01086ad830ba23094ac3c3b165PM/Chat Logs:  https://i.imgur.com/8UbLVSc.png

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: It is still 7 hours ago. I will advice you to be patient. I can understand, it is not easy to experience something like this if you have done nothing wrong.If nothing happens. You can PM this their official account on our forum: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3067300I hope Rollbitcom will also see this thread and respond as soon as possiblen after you provide evidences.You need to give evidence of what you are talking about as CryptoGrizzly talked about it in his post.

comments.author: Avallacchhh
comments.body: Thx, I will wait and then post the chats. I started reading some of the other complaints about rollbit, but i dont think i made a mistake. I also thought rollbit would be a safe page so i hope everything will be solved

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP it is still not up to 24 hours since you made a withdrawal why raise a scam accusation thread for this? I will advise that you give them a little time to look into your case. Possibly you might get your pay before it is upto 24hours also note that you have failed to update us with your proof to back your claims as you have done creating this thread.Â  It would be nice if you communicate with the representative provided by Oshosondy and if they fail to respond, here is the link to their announcement thread so you could make a complaint there calling their attention to the thread you created for them.Rollbit Announcemnet thread

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: July 12, 2023, 08:31:56 PMLast edit: July 12, 2023, 08:45:11 PM by acroman08
comments.body: just so you know, it is possible that your account was flagged for something and their team might be doing some investigation. you not being able to withdraw your fund might take longer than expected. I do hope I am wrong and your issue gets resolved soon.I've sent a PM to Rollbit Razer informing him about this thread. he is usually the one responding to issues that has something to do with Rollbit, you might hear from him soon.

comments.author: Rollbit Razer
comments.body: Quote from: Avallacchhh on July 12, 2023, 01:28:53 PMHi, i registered on rollbit about 3 weeks ago and do mainly betting. I had no problems, i deposited funds and withdraw funds, but now it says i cant withdraw anymore. I asked the support, but they said they need to wait for a colleague. Thats about 7 hours ago and they wont answer anymore if i ask about an update. I dont know what to do anymore. Someone know what to do?Hey there,Thanks for raising your issue here.What is your display name on Rollbit (feel free to PM)?Thanks,Razer

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: Avallacchhh on July 12, 2023, 01:54:22 PMThx, I will wait and then post the chats. I started reading some of the other complaints about rollbit, but i dont think i made a mistake. I also thought rollbit would be a safe page so i hope everything will be solved They have a representative that noticed this thread and asking for your ID. Now is your chance to make it known to them and so you'll have the idea on what has happened to you. If there's no problem with your activity, they won't do something with your account but it's better to let you know what has happened with your account and why it has been disabled.Hopefully, your account and your problem gets resolved asap.

Your answer will be " sportsbook abuse " like a lot of players who won on your sportsbook after they get flagged by your sports vetting provider as a winners instead of limit the betting to them like Stake or other reputable gambling sites you ban them and steal the ðŸ’° money

comments.author: Avallacchhh
comments.body: Quote from: boyptc on July 12, 2023, 11:58:13 PMQuote from: Avallacchhh on July 12, 2023, 01:54:22 PMThx, I will wait and then post the chats. I started reading some of the other complaints about rollbit, but i dont think i made a mistake. I also thought rollbit would be a safe page so i hope everything will be solved They have a representative that noticed this thread and asking for your ID. Now is your chance to make it known to them and so you'll have the idea on what has happened to you. If there's no problem with your activity, they won't do something with your account but it's better to let you know what has happened with your account and why it has been disabled.Hopefully, your account and your problem gets resolved asap.Hi, Thanks for reaching out. Support unrestricted my account yesterday so everything is fine now, but they couldnt tell me why it was restricted the first place so im a bit afraid now and dont know if i should stop betting on rollbit or not.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Avallacchhh on July 13, 2023, 05:08:48 AMHi, Thanks for reaching out. Support unrestricted my account yesterday so everything is fine now, but they couldnt tell me why it was restricted the first place so im a bit afraid now and dont know if i should stop betting on rollbit or not.Temporarily freezing withdrawal can be for several reason, but for this one it's quite likely, IMO, that your betting history were under review by the betting provider to check for any abuse or something else. If this is the case, there's nothing Rollbit can do but to wait for the conducted analysis to be completed [by the game provider, not by Rollbit] and when they give a go, your fund got processed.As this matter is solved, you might want to lock this thread and marked it as solved by editing the thread title and add the "solved" word. The button to lock a thread is at the bottom left of the page.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Avallacchhh on July 13, 2023, 05:08:48 AMHi, Thanks for reaching out. Support unrestricted my account yesterday so everything is fine now, but they couldnt tell me why it was restricted the first place so im a bit afraid now and dont know if i should stop betting on rollbit or not.I will not say you should stop gambling using rollbit, but you need to be active on their announcement thread. This is rollbit announcement thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5326640.msg56653011#msg56653011If you follow them and read what people are posting there, you will have better idea too. You account is now working fine again, we are happy to hear that. Do not violate the rules if the gambling sites and I do not think you have any problem if you do not violate any rule of the gambling site.I too will advice you to lock this thread when the problem as been solved.You can also change your topic tile to something like this: [solved] I cant withdraw my funds (1200$) on Rollbit.com

comments.author: Avallacchhh
comments.body: thx for ur help, but i think i will go the safe route and withdraw my funds and just go gambling there.
